title: Rammus Bot standing still when using powerball. [Gameplay]
body: When playing coop vs Ai, The rammus bot sits in place everytime it uses Powerball. It doesnt matter if its chasing you, in battle, or just laning in general. It happens everytime without fail.

replies.body: Yep.  Fix that one rito.  Might be better to report it as a bug though.
